us.phonetic: /adv. ˈoʊvərˈɔl; adj., n. ˈoʊvərˌɔl/, (adv. ō′vər ôl′; adj., n. ō′vər ôl′)

example.eg: Overall, he did a fairly good job.
The overall cost was more than we'd estimated.
example.egtrans: 总计成本比我们之前预计的要高。

example.eg: He wore his overalls while working.
The farmer's overalls were covered in mud.
example.egtrans: 那个农夫的牛仔吊带工装裤上全是泥巴。

example.eg: The tea lady wore a flowery overall.
example.egtrans: 端茶小姐穿着一件花朵图样的垂旌。

us.phonetic: /adv. ˈoʊvərˈɔl; adj., n. ˈoʊvərˌɔl/, (adv. ō′vər ôl′; adj., n. ō′vər ôl′)

example.eg: Carol was the overall winner of the competition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 总冠军, 最终获奖者
